text: Anɨb ñɨn bad ak, Jisas am God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek mɨgan ak mɨdɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñolɨgup. Kɨli mɨdupsek takaw nop nɨgun agɨl, maynab yɨbɨl tɨkjakɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek ak mɨgan ayaŋ amelɨgɨpal. Pen kɨsɨlɨm owaknɨŋ, Jisas ne amɨl, man Olip dum kɨnolɨgup.
